articles.description: Mississippi State head coach Ben Howland joins The Paul Finebaum Show to discuss an upcoming game against the Commodores and SEC teams making the NCAA tournament.
articles.headline: Howland previews matchup vs. Vandy, MSU's road ahead

images.caption: Mississippi State head coach Ben Howland joins The Paul Finebaum Show to discuss an upcoming game against the Commodores and SEC teams making the NCAA tournament.
images.name: Howland previews matchup vs. Vandy, MSU's road ahead

articles.description: Members of the Michigan State faculty voted 61-4 to express no confidence in the eight-member governing body at the university. Meanwhile, the institution's interim president wrote to the campus community about cooperation with ongoing investigations.
articles.headline: Michigan State faculty delivers no-confidence vote on board of trustees

images.caption: The Michigan State faculty's vote against the board of trustees came largely in response to the board's decision to name John Engler the school's interim president.
images.name: John Engler [600x400] - Copy (2)

images.caption: Michigan State students, including one who jumped onto and sat on the middle of a table, interrupt an MSU board of trustees meeting to protest the school's selection of John Engler as the interim president.
images.name: MSU students vent frustration over interim president selection

articles.description: The fans have spoken and said Virginia deserves to be the No. 1 team in college basketball.
articles.headline: Capital One Fan Vote: Which team should be No. 1?

images.name: Virginia Tech vs. Virginia (Kyle Guy (5) celebrates after scoring) [608x342]

articles.description: An NCAA group working on a new model for undergraduate transfers says it is making progress, but it will not allow any proposal granting immediate eligibility for all athletes wishing to switch schools.
articles.headline: NCAA group won't allow any proposal granting immediate eligibility to all transfers

articles.description: Struggling to find that perfect last minute Valentine's Day gift? Mike Gundy, and his saxophone, have some advice for all those hopeless romantics.
articles.headline: Let Mike Gundy sax up your Valentine's Day
